languages.text: Мало кто сможет тягаться в славе с Космическими волками — яростными и гордыми сынами Лемана Расса, кровожадными охотниками с мира Фенрис. Ульфар вступил на тропу войны много десятилетий назад, и кровавый след тянется за ним с той поры. С победным воем вступает он в каждую схватку, ведь нет страха смерти для того, чью сагу будут с почтением петь братья в Зале Великого Волка. Его буйный нрав и юношескую тягу к славе и хвастовству не остудили ни годы походов, ни тяжелое испытание — заключение в Темном городе Комморре. Примкнув к свите Вольного Торговца, Ульфар вновь пишет свою сагу в Просторе Коронус, а враги Человечества содрогаются, услышав его боевой клич.

Few can match the glory of the Space Wolves, the fierce and proud sons of Leman Russ, bloodthirsty hunters from the world of Fenris. Ulfar set foot on the warpath many decades ago, and a trail of blood has stretched out behind him ever since. He enters every battle with a triumphant howl, for there is no fear of death for one whose saga will be reverently sung by his brothers in the Hall of the Great Wolf. His violent temper and boyish desire for glory and boasting have not been cooled by his years of fighting nor by his ordeal of being held captive in the Dark City of Commorragh. Having joined the Rogue Trader's retinue, Ulfar has resumed the writing of his saga in the Koronus Expanse, and the enemies of Humanity tremble at the sound of his battle cry.

languages.text: 在荣耀方面，几乎没有人能与太空野狼相提并论。他们是黎曼·鲁斯的子嗣，是来自芬里斯世界的嗜血猎人，凶猛而骄傲。几十年前，乌尔法踏上了战争之路，自那之后，他的身后留下了无数血迹。他发出胜利的咆哮，加入每一场战斗。他从不惧怕死亡，因为他的英雄事迹会被他的兄弟们在巨狼的圣殿中虔诚地颂唱。他脾气暴躁，对荣耀与胜利几乎带着孩子气般的渴望。即便参加了多年战斗，在黑暗之城科摩罗遭到囚禁之后，他心中的烈焰也没有冷却下来。后来，乌尔法加入了加入了行商浪人的行列，在科罗努斯扩区重新书写他的传奇史诗。他战斗的怒吼足以令所有人类之敌心惊胆战。
languages.original_text: Few can match the glory of the Space Wolves, the fierce and proud sons of Leman Russ, bloodthirsty hunters from the world of Fenris. Ulfar set foot on the warpath many decades ago, and a trail of blood has stretched out behind him ever since. He enters every battle with a triumphant howl, for there is no fear of death for one whose saga will be reverently sung by his brothers in the Hall of the Great Wolf. His violent temper and boyish desire for glory and boasting have not been cooled by his years of fighting nor by his ordeal of being held captive in the Dark City of Commorragh. Having joined the Rogue Trader's retinue, Ulfar has resumed the writing of his saga in the Koronus Expanse, and the enemies of Humanity tremble at the sound of his battle cry.

languages.text: Hay poca gente capaz de igualar la gloria de los Lobos Espaciales, los feroces y orgullosos hijos de Leman Russ. Estos sanguinarios cazadores provienen del mundo de Fenris. Ulfar emprendió el camino de la guerra hace numerosas décadas y desde entonces le sigue un rastro de sangre. Acomete cada batalla con un aullido triunfal, pues alguien cuya saga será entonada con reverencia en los salones del Gran Lobo no conoce el miedo a la muerte. Su brutal temperamento y sus juveniles ansias de gloria y fanfarronería no se han visto coartadas ni por años de combates ni por el trance de su cautiverio en la Ciudad Siniestra de Commorragh. Tras unirse al séquito de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, Ulfar ha retomado su saga en la Extensión de Koronus. Que los enemigos de la Humanidad tiemblen ante su grito de guerra.
languages.original_text: Few can match the glory of the Space Wolves, the fierce and proud sons of Leman Russ, bloodthirsty hunters from the world of Fenris. Ulfar set foot on the warpath many decades ago, and a trail of blood has stretched out behind him ever since. His violent temper and boyish desire for glory and boasting have not been cooled by his years of fighting nor by his ordeal of being held captive in the Dark City of Commorragh. Having joined the Rogue Trader's retinue, Ulfar has resumed the writing of his saga in the Koronus Expanse, and the enemies of Humanity tremble at the sound of his battle cry.

languages.text: 獰猛で誇り高きレマン・ラスの息子たち、フェンリスの世界を出身とする血に飢えた狩人たち、スペースウルフの栄光に匹敵する者はほとんどいない。ウルファーが戦場に足を踏み入れたのは何十年も前のことだが、それ以降、彼の背後には敵の血の跡が続いている。彼は戦いに臨む際、勝利の雄叫びを必ずあげる。その栄光あるサーガが、“大狼”の殿堂で同胞によって歌い継がれる者にとって、死など恐るるに足らぬものなのだ。彼の激しい気性と、少年のごとき栄光への渇望は、長年の戦いや、〈仄暗き都〉コモラフでの虜囚の身となっても、色褪せることはなかった。自由開拓者の従者に加わったウルファーは、コロヌス・エクスパンスでその伝承を再開させ、人類の敵をその鬨の声で慄かせるだろう。
languages.original_text: Few can match the glory of the Space Wolves, the fierce and proud sons of Leman Russ, bloodthirsty hunters from the world of Fenris. Ulfar set foot on the warpath many decades ago, and a trail of blood has stretched out behind him ever since. He enters every battle with a triumphant howl, for there is no fear of death for one whose saga will be reverently sung by his brothers in the Hall of the Great Wolf. His violent temper and boyish desire for glory and boasting have not been cooled by his years of fighting nor by his ordeal of being held captive in the Dark City of Commorragh. Having joined the Rogue Trader's retinue, Ulfar has resumed the writing of his saga in the Koronus Expanse, and the enemies of Humanity tremble at the sound of his battle cry.

languages.text: Rares sont ceux qui peuvent égaler la gloire des Space Wolves, les fiers fils de Leman Russ et chasseurs sanguinaires du monde de Fenris. Ulfar s'est engagé sur le chemin de la chasse il y a des décennies et laisse depuis une traînée de sang dans son sillage. Avec un cri triomphant, il se jette dans tous les combats sans la moindre hésitation, car la peur de la mort ne saurait hanter celui dont la saga sera à jamais chantée avec révérence par ses frères réunis dans le hall du Loup Suprême. Les années de combat et sa captivité prolongée dans la Cité Crépusculaire de Commorragh n'ont en rien atténué son tempérament violent, ni sa soif puérile de gloire et sa tendance à la vantardise. Depuis qu'Ulfar a rejoint l'équipage {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, il a repris l'écriture de sa saga dans les Étendues de Koronus et fait trembler les ennemis de l'humanité lorsqu'il pousse son cri de guerre.
languages.original_text: Few can match the glory of the Space Wolves, the fierce and proud sons of Leman Russ, bloodthirsty hunters from the world of Fenris. Ulfar set foot on the warpath many decades ago, and a trail of blood has stretched out behind him ever since. He enters every battle with a triumphant howl, for there is no fear of death for one whose saga will be reverently sung by his brothers in the Hall of the Great Wolf. His violent temper and boyish desire for glory and boasting have not been cooled by his years of fighting nor by his ordeal of being held captive in the Dark City of Commorragh. Having joined the Rogue Trader's retinue, Ulfar has resumed the writing of his saga in the Koronus Expanse, and the enemies of Humanity tremble at the sound of his battle cry.

traits.locale_text: Rares sont ceux qui peuvent égaler la gloire des Space Wolves, les fiers fils de Leman Russ et chasseurs sanguinaires du monde de Fenris. Ulfar s'est engagé sur le chemin de la chasse il y a des décennies et laisse depuis une traînée de sang dans son sillage. Depuis qu'Ulfar a rejoint l'équipage {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, il a repris l'écriture de sa saga dans les Étendues de Koronus et fait trembler les ennemis de l'humanité lorsqu'il pousse son cri de guerre.

languages.text: Nur wenige sind so ruhmreich wie die Space Wolves – die wilden und stolzen Söhne von Leman Russ, blutrünstige Jäger von der Welt Fenris. Ulfar hat vor vielen Jahrzehnten den Kriegspfad beschritten und zieht seitdem eine Blutspur hinter sich her. Mit einem triumphierenden Heulen stürzt er sich furchtlos in jedes Gefecht – denn es gibt keine Angst vor dem Tode in einem Wolf, dessen Saga von seinen Brüdern bis in alle Ewigkeit ehrfürchtig in der Halle des Großen Wolfs besungen werden wird. Seine brutalen Launen und sein knabenhafter Wunsch nach Ruhm und Prahlerei wurden durch seine Jahre des Kampfs nicht abgeschwächt, und auch nicht durch die Qualen, die er als Gefangener in der Dunklen Stadt Commorragh erleiden musste. Seit er sich dem Gefolge {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} angeschlossen hat, schreibt Ulfar seine Saga in der Koronus-Ausdehnung weiter, und die Feinde der Menschheit erzittern ob seines Kampfschreis.
languages.original_text: Few can match the glory of the Space Wolves, the fierce and proud sons of Leman Russ, bloodthirsty hunters from the world of Fenris. Ulfar set foot on the warpath many decades ago, and a trail of blood has stretched out behind him ever since. languages.text: Fenris dünyasının kana susamış avcıları, Leman Russ'ın vahşi ve gururlu oğulları olan Uzay Kurtları'nın ihtişamıyla pek azı rekabet edebilir. Ulfar, uzun yıllar önce savaş yoluna ayak bastı ve o günden beridir arkasında kanlı bir iz bırakıyor. Destanı, Ulu Kurt'un Salonu'nda kardeşleri tarafından ihtiramla dillendirilecek olan birisi, ölümden korkmaz. Bu yüzden Ulfar, her savaşa muzaffer bir ulumayla atılır. Ne yıllar içinde katıldığı savaşlar ne de Kara Şehir Commorragh'ta esir tutulurken çektiği çile, vahşi öfkesi ve çocuksu zafer ile övgü arzusunu bastıramadı. Hür Tüccar'ın maiyetine katılan Ulfar, Koronus Enginliği'nde destanını yazmaya devam ediyor. İnsanlığın düşmanları ise onun savaş çığlığını işittiklerinde tir tir titriyor.
languages.original_text: Few can match the glory of the Space Wolves, the fierce and proud sons of Leman Russ, bloodthirsty hunters from the world of Fenris. Ulfar set foot on the warpath many decades ago, and a trail of blood has stretched out behind him ever since. He enters every battle with a triumphant howl, for there is no fear of death for one whose saga will be reverently sung by his brothers in the Hall of the Great Wolf. His violent temper and boyish desire for glory and boasting have not been cooled by his years of fighting nor by his ordeal of being held captive in the Dark City of Commorragh.
